a.xlink:title: The Presentation Subsystem handles drawing offscreen render results to a swap image.
A Render Subsystem manages a render pipeline, layout, and subsystem descriptors. A Render Subsystem b...
THe RenderContext manages the Vulkan instance, device, and swapchain state.
The context queue state creates and maintains the device queue setup.
A Device Queue is a queue on the logical device to which operations can be submitted.
The debug label handler allows setting debug labels for Vulkan objects.
A pipeline state object (PSO) stores a pipeline and its bind point.
